basic.description:
{Basic Pathfinding}

Reduces the movement penalty for rough terrain by 25% and increases movement by 5%.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Pathfinding}

Reduces the movement penalty for rough terrain by 50% and increases movement by 10%.

expert.description:
{Expert Pathfinding}

Reduces the movement penalty for rough terrain by 75% and increases movement by 15%.
